name: Mend Repo Integration
summary: Dashboards and Inputs for the Mend Repo Integration
description:
This content pack includes the following dashboards:
- Controller Search
- Scanner Search
- Remediate Search

It also includes the following healthchecks for the containers:
- Scanner Healthcheck
- Remediate Healthcheck

Currently this does not support the controller healthcheck as the API response returns an empty message.

This content pack also includes the following inputs:
- Mend Repo Integration - Allows ingesting of logs from all repo integration containers.

- Remediate Healthcheck - Periodically sends an API request to the Remediate healthcheck endpoint.

- Scanner Healtchcheck - Periodically sends an API request to the Scanner healthcheck endpoint.
